desc: Anglo American PLC managed operations and projects are subject to a comprehensive programme of external and internal reviews and audits aimed to provide assurance with respect to Ore Reserve and Mineral Resource estimates that are published annually. AR 3 provides a system with strong audit recording capabilities to provide additional confidence in the published estimates by providing the ability to track who signs-off and approves the information
heading: Anglo Resource and Reserve Reporting (AR3)
